content: Hamsters are small, stout-bodied rodents with short tails, small furry ears, and short, stocky legs. They are known for their thick, silky fur, which can be long or short and come in various colors like black, grey, honey, white, brown, yellow, or red. Hamsters are popular pets due to their playful nature and manageable size, with common species including Syrian (also known as golden or teddy bear) and dwarf hamsters.
